game

类 Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Board Chessboard, storage and management of chess, chess logic, game logic, recording, and so on. Class BoardGUI shall be fully for the control and refresh of the board.
    另请参阅:
    BoardGUI, Piece, Position

      convert the board into string type chess and connection them

      • move

        public boolean move(Position start,
                    Position end)
        move piece Determine whether the movement is correct, check whether the game is finished after moving, and then move according to the type of piece. Check the check, record the movement and change the rounds, if move correctly, the return will be true or it will return false
        参数:
        start - start position
        end - end position
        返回:
        if moving is correct
